description: Jake is still in shock after finding his grandfather’s porn vid. He immediately calls his father, John Magnum, to inform him, but he is doubly shocked when he finds out that he already knew! Not only did he already know, but the buff, bald-headed hunk is a porn star himself! John reassures him they’ll talk about it later as he’s currently on set getting ready to pound out sexy bottom bitch, Aston Springs, on the set of their latest film.
title: Family Business Part 2
